122.content:
Did you come to this chapter of the story to see just one girl from the Big Bang Theory become fat? Well, how about all the girls instead. Where this story is going is what if one character just didn't meet and join the gang. If you like this story, you can continue or go to another option.

In the year 2003, Howard Wolowitz turned a corner somewhere and became fast friends with Raj Koothrapali. The first and major change is that Howard turned a different corner and never met Raj. Thus, he never met Sheldon and Leonard. Thus, due to Leonard never experimenting with rocket fuel, the elevator still works.

In 2005, Raj's sister Priya was visiting for a short time. Leonard and her did a very short relationship. In 2007, a girl named Penny moved across the hall from Sheldon and Leonard. Not long later, Raj hooks up with this girl named Christy, whose one of Penny's friends. When Raj got broadband, his parents quickly ended this relationship and made him start one with Lalita Gupta.

Raj was so lonely during this time that he went from a mute nerd to a drunk playboy wannabe. In 2008, Leonard and Penny did have a date, but Penny dumped him after a poor choice of words. Later that year, Penny was having personal frustrations with life and became addicted to online video games. But because Howard wasn't around to get her off of the game,she is still addicted. Now let's start!
122.title: lazy

1221.content:
Penny just got home after a failed acting audition, lack of sex in six months, not receiving a raise, and used her car keys to open her apartment door. Luckily for her, her neighbor Sheldon was home and offered to let her stay over till the locksmith arrives. She becomes curious about the online game that he's playing. She quickly makes herself an account, learns how to play, and reached level 3 by the time Leonard arrived.

Later in the afternoon, and late at night, she returns to get more information about the game from Sheldon. Soon, she starts calling Sheldon at his work. Leonard tried to come over and get her out of the addiction, but he found quite a site. Penny has been wearing the same ratty clothes for days, there are Cheetos in her hair and stained clothes, and she only focuses on her game.

She gets worse and worse by the day. Now she starts to chug whole cans of red bull and is starting to not need help from Sheldon. Her apartment is a mess and she isn't even going to work anymore. Penny starts to notice that the Cheesecake Factory hasn't fired her yet. But Penny is oblivious to the extra weight she is getting. But things soon get worse...Real worse.
1221.title: 2008: Divergence

choices: Leslie Winkle becomes Raj's booty call
12211.content:
Penny has gained a decent amount of weight, most of it going to her belly, causing her to constantly fix the position of her shirt, till finally she just takes it off and just wears her bra and jacket. In the rare moment of stopping the game, she goes and takes an hour long shower. She then notices that almost none of her clothes are clean, except for a few lucky pairs of clothing. As she goes to do the Laundry. On her way up, she meets Leonard, who then introduces her to his new girlfriend Stephanie. She then goes back to her room and compares herself to Stephanie. She then decides to go and buy World of Warcraft. She becomes very addicted to it, almost ignoring the age of conan game. Then not long later, after gaining weight in her thighs, she bumps into Stephanie at the bank when she tries to get more money. She learns that she and Leonard broke up and she is very sad. Penny takes her to her apartment, with Stephanie having a lap top, and they played world of warcraft together. A few weeks later, they gain weight in their breasts, and with Stephanie now looking like Penny's sister.

Later...
12211.title: Penny starts playing more games

122111.content: So it's been a bit of a while since Penny and Stephanie have last been seen by the guys. In their personal news, Leslie Winkle hooked up with Raj and are now in a sex only relationship. When the guys went to a conference and Sheldon needed his flash drive, Penny didn't answer her phone, so Raj called Leslie and had her go get the flash drive. When they returned, Sheldon found out Leslie destroyed his room. He was very furious and forbade Raj from coming over for a long time. Then a new girl moved into the apartment, Alicia. She manipulated the boys, making her the new queen bee. A much larger penny, now about 220 lbs. Fights Alicia and wins the boys back...Somewhat. After this, she noticed that the guys stopped coming over to get her off the online games and learns that they went to the North Pole. She feels sad, so she and Stephanie get Halo 3.
122111.title: Leslie Winkle becomes Raj's booty call
